sentences.sentence: The reprography of this form can be used.
Lead halide as radiant agent in High Intensity Discharge(HID) lamps used for professional reprography applications.
sentences.translation: 专业复印设备用的高强度放电灯（HID）中作为发光剂的卤化铅。

sentences.sentence: We acknowledge receipt of your letter dated the 3rd this month enclosing the reprography of the insurance policy, we are regret for your loss.
sentences.translation: 本月3日来函和保险单复印件已经收到，我们对贵公司所遭受的损失深表同情。
